page.title: 02INDUSTRY
page.content: There is very little Industry in the Greenock South West / Gourock West area. It is basically a Residential Area. There are however two Industrial Concerns situated in the Larkfield area of Greenock.National Semi Conductors is the main Employer in the area.Like many other Firms in Central Scotland involved in the Electronics Business the Company has decreased its output over the last few years.This has resulted in a reduction of the work force.At its peak the factory employed some 1800 employees.Today (Oct 85) there are only just over 900 employees.The only other insustrial concern in the area is a small unit belonging to the huge I.B.M.complex,but this is only a store employing very few people. .
